rooms.name: The Pub
rooms.description: The pub is full of drunken revellers - the war against the orks has been won, and the fighting heroes have returned home

rooms.name: Your house
rooms.description: Your house overlooks the Lamb and Lion pub, which makes it easy to stumble home when drunk.

rooms.name: A shady alley
rooms.description: The alley is dark with a peculiar mist making it hard to see the other side. You can hear someone whistling poorly.

rooms.name: The castle
rooms.description: The castle was built hundreds of years ago when the city was much richer than it is now.

rooms.name: The city walls
rooms.description: The city walls are eight metres high and two thick, and have kept invaders out for centuries.

notifications.message: Unable to climb up. It's way to high.

rooms.name: A misty alley
rooms.description: A dangerous-looking man stands before you holding a small dagger. "Come any closer and I kill yer!"

rooms.name: The stables
rooms.description: The stables are full of sleeping horses, but at least it is nice and warm in here.

rooms.name: The gardens
rooms.description: The gardens are peaceful and surprisingly of flowers for this time of year.

rooms.name: The hallway
rooms.description: A once clinical and clean white environment. But now there is blood everywhere.
rooms.detailed_description: A long hallway leading up to a door, but this once pristine white and clinically clean environment is not safe anymore. Blood and gore everywhere you can look.

rooms.name: The laboratory
rooms.description: A very clinical and clean white environment. No blood here. Strange.
rooms.detailed_description: You can smell the detergent that has been used to clean this laboratory. It has never been this clean before.
